remarks: Deduce a perpendicularity from perpendicularity and colinearity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
colperpex.p $e |- P = ( Base ` G ) $.
colperpex.d $e |- .- = ( dist ` G ) $.
colperpex.i $e |- I = ( Itv ` G ) $.
colperpex.l $e |- L = ( LineG ` G ) $.
colperpex.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) $.
colperp.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. P ) $.
colperp.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. P ) $.
colperp.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. P ) $.
colperp.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( A L B ) ( perpG ` G ) D ) $.
colperp.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( C e. ( A L B ) \/ A = B ) ) $.
colperp.3 $e |- ( ph -> A =/= C ) $.
colperp $p |- ( ph -> ( A L C ) ( perpG ` G ) D ) $.
